TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto sealed SearchDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The object to check for conformance to certain conditions.
Docs.summary: A way to supply a method that returns yes or no according to conformance of object to a condition.
Docs.returns: True is the object conforms or False if otherwise.
Docs.remarks: Useful in searches where True signifies that the item should be returned as the result of the search.
